ptserver.util

Class ProxyModelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.util.ProxyModelBuilder

  • public class ProxyModelBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    ProxyModelGenerator splices up CompositeActor to support distribution execution. The splicing would be done slightly differently depending where the model runs, client or server. The builder would modify original model by injecting proxy actors that facilitate distributed communication with another instance of proxy model running remotely.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

        topLevelActor - The target model on which builder would perform its operations.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public void build()
           throws IllegalActionException,
                  TypeConflictException,
                  NameDuplicationException,
                  java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Build the ProxyModel that supports distributed execution. In the case of the server model type, sinks and sources marked to run on the client would be replaced with a proxy sinks and sources that facilitate communication with a remote instance of the proxy model. In the case of the client model type, all actors directly connected to sinks and sources marked with a "_remote" attribute would replaced with proxy sources and sinks respectively. All others actor would be removed.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if there is a problem setting a manager or capturing certain type information.
        TypeConflictException - if there is a problem resolving types on the model.
        NameDuplicationException - if there is a problem creating proxy sinks or sources.
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if there is a problem cloning ports or attributes.

      • getModelTypes

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getModelTypes()
        Return the mapping from the typeable named object's full name to its type string. The type string is obtained by calling .toString() method on the type instance.
        Returns:
        Return the mapping from the typeable named object's full name to its type string.

      • getRemoteAttributesMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Settable> getRemoteAttributesMap()
        Return the mapping from the attribute full name's to the attribute instance. The mapping only contains attributes that have ServerUtility.REMOTE_OBJECT_TAG attribute within them.
        Returns:
        the _remoteAttributesMap
